fields.headline: Best Valentine offers
fields.bodyText: Under £200 Majorca: The Monnaber Nou hotel (0034 971 877 176, monnaber.com) in the Tramuntana mountains has two nights' half-board with a champagne reception and candlelit dinner for €160.50pp excluding flights and transfers. Lake District: Travelcare (08701 500388, travelcare.co.uk) has two nights' half-board at the three-star Castle Inn Hotel, Bassenthwaite, for £120pp, including a special Valentine dinner and entertainment. London: 51 Buckingham Gate (0800 6345151, 51-buckinghamgate.co.uk) has a Love Me Do package for £174.50pp for one night's B&B in a junior suite, cocktails, butler service, a champagne river cruise along the Thames, fast-track entry to the London Eye, free use of the St James Court health club and late check-out. An in-suite dinner costs £90 excluding drinks. Guernsey: One Step Holidays (0845 1214867, onestepholidays.co.uk) has two nights' B&B at the Hougue du Pommier country house hotel for £179pp including Gatwick flights, car hire, sparkling wine and hand-made chocolates on arrival and an upgrade to a deluxe room (subject to availability). Belgium: Cresta Holidays (0870 3333303, crestaholidays.co.uk) has two nights' B&B at the three-star Het Putje hotel, Bruges, for £198pp including Eurostar. France: Voyages Ilena (020-7924 4440, voyagesilena.co.uk) has two nights' B&B in a converted farmhouse near St Rémy de Provence for £199pp including car hire, a bottle of champagne on arrival and an eight-course Valentine's dinner with local wines. A special package including silk sheets and beauty products costs £40 extra. Flights extra from £115pp. Under £400 France: Inntravel Shortbreaks (01653 617906, inntravel.co.uk) has two nights' half-board in a three-star hotel by Honfleur harbour for £210pp including Portsmouth-Le Havre ferry crossings, champagne and flowers on arrival and a St Valentine's dinner at the Michelin bib gourmand Entre Terre et Mer. France: Thomson Cities (0870 6061476, thomsoncities.co.uk) has three nights' B&B for the price of two at the four-star Mercure Tour Eiffel Suffran, Paris: £229pp including Eurostar. Italy: Travelscene (020-8424 9648, travelscene.co.uk) has two nights' B&B at the four-star Grand Hotel, Verona, for £270pp, including BA flights from Gatwick. Scotland: The Isle of Eriska hotel (01631 720371, prideofbritainhotels.com) is on a private island near Oban. Two nights' half-board costs £270pp including a bottle of champagne on arrival, full Scottish breakfast, morning coffee, afternoon tea and seven-course dinners. Estonia: Fregata Travel (020-7375 3187, fregatatravel.co.uk) has three nights' B&B at the four-star Imperial Hotel in Tallinn Old Town for £319pp including flights and transfers. Morocco: Cheapholidaydeals.co.uk has two nights at the three-star Tachfine hotel, Marrakech, for £323pp including Gatwick flights. Under £1,000 Hungary: Eurobreak (020-8780 7700, eurobreak.co.uk) has four nights' B&B for the price of three at the four-star Gellért Hotel in Budapest: £405pp including Heathrow flights and transfers. US: Travelplanners (0870 5280041, travelplanners.co.uk) has three nights at the five-star Waldorf Astoria Hotel, New York for £498pp, including BA flights from Heathrow and limousine transfer from the airport. Italy: Carefree Italy (01293 552277, carefree-italy.com) has three nights in a Tuscany cottage for £508pp including scheduled flights from Heathrow or Gatwick, car hire, champagne, flowers and a candlelit meal with wine at a local trattoria. Regional flights available for a small supplement. Surrey: Grayshott Hall (01428 602020, grayshotthall.com) has a three-night Valentine relax and revitalise programme from £635pp including treatments, classes and full-board. India: A weekend at the Taj Mahal costs from £999pp with Greaves Travel (020-7487 9111, greavesindia.com) including BA flights, accommodation at Amarvilas and transfers. Over £1,000 Bermuda: ITC Classics (01244 355300, itcclassics.co.uk) has seven nights' full-board at Cambridge Beaches from £1,613pp, including flights, transfers, breakfast in bed, a candlelit dinner, massages and lessons in how to massage your partner. Grenadines: Complete Caribbean (01423 531031) has a seven-night Lovers Packages on Young Island for £1,695pp including full-board, BA flights and transfers. Club Class upgrades from £820 return. · Offers are subject to availability. Per-person prices are based on two sharing except where stated. Many of the listed companies have other special offers available.
